Value: MEC Resources Limited, through its subsidiaries, operates as an oil and gas exploration and development company in Australia. It holds 100% interests in the EP386 and RL1 permit located in the onshore Bonaparte basin in the Western Australia and Northern Territory respectively; and an 85% interest in the PEP11 petroleum exploration permit located in the offshore Sydney basin. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in South Perth, Australia.
